message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the quality of the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $100 for the product.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering it to you for $125. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $110 for the product.

I'm glad you're willing to negotiate further, Bob. I can see you're serious about getting the product. I'm willing to compromise again, but I need to make a living, so I'm offering it to you for $130. This is as low as I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for you.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $120 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our expectations.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $125, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm thinking we can meet in the middle of our last two offers, so I'm offering it to you for $122.50. This is my final compromise, and I hope you'll accept it.
